name: file_deleted
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A file was deleted  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					files:read 				 The file_deleted event is sent to all connected clients for a team when a file is deleted. Unlike most file events, the file property contains a file ID and not a full file object.
